column4: hi does anyonw know where can i find the mysql/bin directory?
TwoToneSpirit::: Error 22 is no partition, so what ever your trying to boot, has the wrong config in menu.lst
TwoToneSpirit::: where are you getting your info?
TwoToneSpirit::: i just typed it out to you
TwoToneSpirit::: its telling you where your boot partition is
the mysql executables are inside the bin folder :\
